traits.name: Speak with Rats
entries: The ogre can verbally communicate simple concepts to ordinary rats and giant rats.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The ogre makes two Club attacks, two Rat-Tail Whip attacks, or one of each.

actions.name: Club
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 15 (2d10 + 4 damage) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Rat-Tail Whip
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 13 (2d8 + 4 damage) slashing damage, and if the target is Large or smaller, it is pulled 5 feet toward the ogre.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The ogre casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Wisdom as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 11}):
